name: Alfredo's Game
description:
Description

2D Plataformer with movement based on our shoot's recoil.

Alfredo shoots where the circle crosshair points, and must time it because it is always rotating. Each time he shoots the rotation direction changes.

We need to help him get through this creepy dungeon filled with enemies, dangers and lots of secrets.

Creative Statment

This project is a WIP prototype to become a candidate for the Amaze 2020 in the "Human Human Machine" catergory.

It will become a local Multiplayer where 2 players should team up and synchronize to control Alfredo with different capabilities.
